attributes.action: reassess the structure of payments to csa by non resident parents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 15, 20,25%??? thats it, how can the government demand a set amount irrespective of what is available to the non resident parent? what about loans taken before the relationship ended?on going debt because of the divorce or seperation?, the income of the resident parent?the actual financial needs of the child?at a time when the government is saying lenders and people in finance need to look at the way they lend and who they lend to, they themselves are creating a void for the haves and have nots, threatening the non resident parent with asset repossession, registered debt and in some cases inprisonment.its about time this whole situation is reviewed and altered to meet the needs of all concerned, its not about money anymore, its about structuring a system that is fair to all parties.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
